'''Akademiya Recommendation Letter''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained by completing the {{Quest|Hydrological Investigation in The Chasm}}, ''[[Mycological Investigation in The Chasm]]'', and ''[[Paleontological Investigation in The Chasm]]''. It is eventually taken by [[Sadife]] in {{Quest|Purbiruni's Commandment}}.
